article_title: Hamburg, Bremen Said to Need Cargo Links, Handelsblatt Reports
article_text: SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"L6X76E1A74E901","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2010-08-10/hamburg-bremen-need-high-speed-cargo-rail-links-handelsblatt-reports"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-goPGaoj"}   Deutsche Bahn AG’s former Chief Executive Officer Hartmut Mehdorn said Germany must link the ports of Hamburg and Bremen with high-speed cargo tracks to the European railway networks to cope with a future rise in container traffic, Handelsblatt reported, citing an interview with Mehdorn.     Published on ‎10‎ ‎August‎, ‎2010‎ ‎07‎:‎07        Have a confidential tip for our reporters? GET IN TOUCH    Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal.
